abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Third
            District Primary Education Project is to assist the
            Government of Bihar (GOB) to build and strengthen state,
            district, and sub-district institutional capacity to ensure
            that more children, especially from socially disadvantaged
            groups (female, scheduled caste {SC} and scheduled tribe
            {ST} students, working children, children with mild to
            moderate learning disabilities and other children who have
            limited access to educational opportunities), complete a
            five-year primary education cycle of appropriate quality in
            districts with low levels of literacy. The project has three
            components: 1) expanding access to primary education,
            particularly for disadvantaged groups; 2) increasing
            retention and improving learning achievements in primary
            school; and 3) improving state and district capacity to
            manage primary education
